text: His unwavering commitment to his principles is a model for all citizens who wish to make a difference.
His life was a powerful example of how one person can stand up for what they believe in and make a lasting impact.
This is a non-issue that is being used as a weapon by the far-left to silence dissent.
This is a formal, neutral acknowledgment of the end of a person's life.
This is a distraction from the real threats facing our nation, which are domestic and foreign enemies of our way of life.
This is a simple, factual record of a citizen's lifespan and should be treated as such.
His passing is a reminder that even the most dedicated individuals are mortal and their time is finite.
His dedication to his cause was a source of inspiration and a call to action for many.
This is a non-issue that is being blown out of proportion by the radical left to score political points.
